ai_explanation.introduction_japanese: 迎えは、駅や空港で人を迎えるときや、友達を車で迎えに行くとき、式典やイベントで歓迎するときによく使う言葉です。
ai_explanation.introduction_english: The noun むかえ is commonly used when meeting someone at a station or airport, when going to pick up a friend by car, or during ceremonies and events to welcome people.
meanings: person sent to meet a visitor
pickup (the act of going to meet someone)
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_japanese: 「迎え」は、人が到着したときに出て行って会うことや、その時の挨拶、または到着した人に会いに行く人を指す言葉です。例えば、駅で友達を迎えに行く時や空港で迎えに来てもらう場面で使います。
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word むかえ means 'meeting', 'greeting', or 'welcome', and it can also mean the person who goes to meet someone or the act of picking someone up when they arrive.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: The first kanji means greet or welcome. It appears in words like でむかえ which means coming out to meet someone and かんげい which means a formal welcome. In でむかえ the kanji gives the idea of physically meeting someone, and in かんげい it helps show a warm or formal greeting.

common_words: 出迎え (でむかえ): coming out to meet someone, reception
歓迎 (かんげい): welcome, reception

synonyms: 歓迎 : かんげい : welcome, reception
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the むかえ is かんげい. かんげい is more formal and often used for ceremonies or official welcomes, while むかえ focuses on the act of meeting or picking someone up.
antonyms: 見送り : みおくり : seeing off, farewell
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the むかえ is みおくり. みおくり means seeing someone off when they leave, which is the opposite action to meeting someone on arrival.

examples.furigana: 駅(えき)で迎(むか)えに行(い)く。

translations.EN: I'll pick you up at the station.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ đón bạn ở ga.
translations.FR: Je viendrai te chercher à la gare.
translations.MY: ငါ မင်းကို ဘူတာမှာ လိုက်ပို့ပေးမယ်။
translations.HI: मैं तुम्हें स्टेशन पर ले आऊंगा।
translations.FA: من شما را از ایستگاه سوار می‌کنم.

examples.kanji: 家族が空港に迎えに来た。
examples.furigana: 家族(かぞく)が空港(くうこう)に迎(むか)えに来(き)た。

translations.EN: My family came to pick me up at the airport.
translations.ES: Mi familia vino a recogerme al aeropuerto.
translations.VI: Gia đình tôi đã đến đón tôi ở sân bay.
translations.FR: Ma famille est venue me chercher à l'aéroport.
translations.NE: मेरो परिवार मलाई विमानस्थलमा लिन आयो।
translations.BN: আমার পরিবার আমাকে বিমানবন্দরে নিতে এসেছিল।
translations.TL: Dumating ang pamilya ko para sunduin ako sa airport.
translations.HI: मेरा परिवार मुझे हवाई अड्डे पर लेने आया।
translations.AR: لقد أتت عائلتي لاستقبالي في المطار.
translations.FA: خانواده‌ام برای استقبال از من به فرودگاه آمدند.

examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)に迎(むか)えを頼(たの)んだ。

translations.EN: I asked him to pick me up.
translations.VI: Tôi đã nhờ anh ấy đến đón tôi.
translations.FR: Je lui ai demandé de venir me chercher.
translations.BN: আমি তাকে আমাকে তুলে নিতে বললাম।
translations.TL: Tinanong ko siya para sunduin ako.
translations.HI: मैंने उससे कहा कि वह मुझे ले जाये।
translations.FA: از او خواستم که مرا سوار کند.

examples.kanji: 迎えの時間は六時です。
examples.furigana: 迎(むか)えの時間(じかん)は六時(ろくじ)です。

translations.ES: La hora de recogida es a las seis en punto.
translations.VI: Thời gian đón là sáu giờ.
translations.FR: L'heure de prise en charge est à six heures.
translations.TL: Ang oras ng pick-up ay alas-sais.
translations.MY: လာယူချိန်က ခြောက်နာရီပါ။
translations.HI: पिक-अप का समय छह बजे है।
translations.FA: ساعت تحویل گرفتن ساعت شش است.

examples.furigana: 温(あたた)かい迎(むか)えを受(う)けた。

translations.VI: Tôi đã nhận được sự chào đón nồng nhiệt.
translations.TL: Nakatanggap ako ng mainit na pagtanggap.
translations.HI: मेरा गर्मजोशी से स्वागत किया गया।

examples.furigana: 迎(むか)えの車(くるま)が来(き)た。

translations.EN: The car came to pick me up.
translations.FR: La voiture est venue me chercher.
translations.TL: Dumating ang sasakyan para sunduin ako.
translations.FA: ماشین اومد دنبالم تا منو ببره.

person sent to meet a visitor.TL: taong ipinadala upang makipagkita sa isang bisita

person sent to meet a visitor.HI: किसी आगंतुक से मिलने के लिए भेजा गया व्यक्ति
person sent to meet a visitor.FA: شخصی که برای ملاقات با یک بازدیدکننده فرستاده شده است
EN: pickup (the act of going to meet someone)

english_definitions: person sent to meet a visitor
